titles.title: A resolution to amend S. Res. 73 to increase funding for the Special Reserve.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/19/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Amends S.Res. 73, 111th Congress (authorizing expenditures by Senate committees and establishing a Special Reserve within funds in the Expenses of Inquiries and Investigations account) to increase such funds for March 1, 2009-September 30, 2009. Declares that such additional funds shall not be considered to be subject to a specified 89% limitation on Special Reserves.
